/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. Cars and pedestrians animate the scene, contributing to the dynamic energy of the city. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape.
